testcase.name: oradb::prepareautostart Solaris should contain File[/etc/oracle] with ensure => "present", mode => "0755" and owner => "root"
oradb::prepareautostart Solaris should contain File[/tmp/oradb_smf.xml] with ensure => "present", mode => "0755", owner => "root" and content =~ /\/etc\/oracle/

oradb::prepareautostart Solaris should contain Exec[enable service oracle] with command => "svccfg -v import /tmp/oradb_smf.xml", user => "root", logoutput => true, path => "/usr/local/bin:/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/sbin:/sbin", unless => "svccfg list | grep oracledatabase" and require => ["File[/tmp/oradb_smf.xml]", "File[/etc/oracle]"]
